channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Water emerging from drain implying blockage in pipework, 20th December
item.description:
The drain opposite Pirton House has water draining OUT of the drain. It then runs downhill over two further apparently blocked drainage grids before finally draining into the third by the railway bridge, although this is also overloaded in heavy rain.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: An area about 6 foot long creating multiple potholes getting bigger every day. Very dangerous cannot avoid them unless you pull into opposite side of the road., 20th December
item.description:
Just after railway Bridge before turning into the Reddings Road been there for quite some time getting deeper and wider. Needs urgent attention.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large part of the road broken up forming a large deep pothole, 20th December
item.description:
About halfway down north Road west before you reached the Community Centre fairly central in the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Road West, Golden Valley, Cheltenham

large pothole already reported but has become bigger

item.title: Smashed bottle by bike racks, 20th December
item.description:
Someone dropped a glass bottle right by the bike rack outside M&S. Thanks for clearing this up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 166-168, High Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All 3 drains are blocked, 20th December
item.description:
All 3 drains are blocked. Also water flows from the opposite side of the road into the 3 blocked drains. The footpath is flooded which means pedestrians have to walk in the road to avoid the flooding. Drains are blocked with road debris, not just leaves!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malvern Road, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 street lights are permanently out around Pittville circus, 19th December
item.description:
2 lamps are out on the east side of Pittville circus roundabout, this is making the road very dark and dangerous to drive. Plus walking home at night is hazardous on uneven pavement and feels dangerous in the dark when alone.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Pittville Circus, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole which is deep and large in area., 19th December

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Lawns, Gotherington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Must be a burst pipe which has been going on & off for a few months. Today looked like a serious loss of water., 19th December
item.description:
Opposite the Lilly hill golf club.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartley Close, Cheltenham

item.title: Every drain/gully on east side of slope of bridge over M5 on Fiddington lane, both north and south sides of the carriageway, 19th December
item.description:
On east slope of bridge over M5, heading towards Tredington from Fiddington This is a recurring annual problem. I believe that these may not have been emptied recently because, in all fairness to the gully cleaning crews, these blocked drains are extremely difficult to see unless one is walking.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ashchurch Rural, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 massive potholes on Gloucester Road, 19th December
item.description:
Gloucester Road around andoversford primary school near bend and it has damaged my alloy and my tyre. My car Registration LO73BGF waiting for recovery and I have uploaded pictures of the potholes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Andoversford, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
